title: Game disconnecting for no reason
body: Every now and then the game just disconnects, the client still works and theres no troubles with my internet, its just ingame it just dcs for about a minute then continues. at first i thought it was my firewall as i've had problems with it in the past, but ive disabled them and it still happens. i have absolutely no idea what could be causing this and its insanely frustrating.

replies.body:
Hey there,

Sounds like this may be an issue with your connection, does everything else function as expected during these dropouts?
Yeah nothing else seems effected at all, and my firewall sometimes blocks it randomly... i really have no explanation, but it doesn't seem to be happening anymore except for the rare firewall block.
